C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: { BasedOnStyle: WebKit, AlignAfterOpenBracket: Align, AlignArrayOfStructures: Right, AlignEscapedNewlines: Left, AlignOperands: AlignAfterOperator, AlignTrailingComments: Leave, AllowShortBlocksOnASingleLine: Always, AllowShortCaseLabelsOnASingleLine: true, AllowShortIfStatementsOnASingleLine: true, BreakBeforeBraces: Attach, IndentCaseLabels: true, ReflowComments: false, SortIncludes: Never, SortUsingDeclarations: Never, TabWidth: 4 }
